notesStmt.note: At foot of verso: "This famous operator, J.A.K. is to be spoken with at his lodgings every day, from 8 in the morning till 12 at noon, and from 2 till 9 at night; or at the six [cans] office, over-ag[a]inst his stage, near Little Turn-stile in Holborn.".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
Verify text at foot on verso.
